name: afterworld.
description:
Wake up in a world fallen to time, a world unknown to you,  you must escape the strange place you find yourself in, to only find what's left of the outside world.
(Released under the working title of project oblivion, but formally known as afterword.)

Made for windows only.  

Controls.
Left Click | Walk & Interact
Right Click | Observe
Inventory displayed at the top when you hover, you can attempt to use   items on one another by dragging them on top of one another.

SPOILER | WALKTHROUGH VIDEO.
